item.title: The new website is live! (kind of)
item.description:
So, the new website is live…kind of. Actually I’m re-building it entirely using Jekyll because there is just something satisfying about a statically compiled website. And it has a nifty blog feature built in, so I guess I’ll try to use it. Why not, right?

I do apologize that there isn’t much to see here yet. Rest assured, I am feverishly working to add the rest of my content. And guess what? When I do, I’m probably gonna blog about it.
item.dc:creator: jmtodaro
